content: *this fun little shoulder purse in the shape of a heart is easy to crochet lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40550 *cctq-heartbag pdf* skill level easy level 2 mc chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 100 yards cc homespun® article #790 1 ball crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm 1 set 13/16 \ 21 mm sew-on snaps sewing needle and thread to match mc the chenille some construction required to finish
